thread.title: 1 killed, 4 injured in Florida ZombiCon shooting
thread.title_full: 1 killed, 4 injured in Florida ZombiCon shooting | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: 1 killed, 4 injured in Florida ZombiCon shooting
text:
Gunfire erupted at Florida's ZombiCon on Saturday night, leaving one person dead and four injured, police said.
According to the News-Press , shots rang out about 11:45 p.m. at the event in Fort Myers. A male victim died at the scene, and four others were treated for "non-life-threatening injuries," Fort Myers police Lt. Victor Medico told the newspaper .
>> Read more trending stories
The suspect is still on the run, authorities said.
"The organizers of ZombiCon, Pushing DaiZies, Inc. are deeply saddened by the news of what happened within the footprint of our event," the organizers of the convention, an annual charity event that drew more than 20,000 people this year, wrote on Facebook . "We take the safety of our patrons very seriously and take precautions in hiring security and police officers for our annual event. Our prayers go out to the family members and individuals involved in the incident."
